item.description:
Laughter Yoga at The Universe Gym
361 High Street, Bath

Bring more joy into your life! Laughter is a powerful tool to reduce stress, boost your overall well-being, and just feels good.

Weâ€™ll do playful laughter exercises and breathing exercises, ending with a guided relaxation. No special equipment is needed. Just bring a water bottle and wear comfortable clothing.

We'll be laughing on the second floor in the tumbling room. Follow the Ha Ha signs up.

Thursday nights from 6:30 to 7:30.

Cost $5. Come and try it for free!
item.how_to_find_us: Go up to the second floor, following the Ha Ha signs.
item.name: Laughter Yoga at the Universe Gym
